A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I understand all the hate\, but I also understand that with a franchise such as this — where fan theories make up a large part of the discourse — it’s always going to be hard to put out the exact movie that everybody wanted to see. When TFA came out\, the world had been devoid of any fresh Star Wars lore tied into the original trilogy\, but now that the market is being more saturated\, the films are going to have be of the highest quality. That all being said\, this movie is certainly enjoyable and does give the hardcore fan base its kicks\, but it also missed out on some opportunities to expand the canon\, which obviously disappointed many people. If you’re trying to decide if it’s worth seeing\, the answer is still yes.
